title: The Price of Faith
description: Separated and miserable, Thanquil Darkheart and Jezzet Velâ€™urn both have their reasons for wanting to leave the Dragon Empire. Jezzet flees from the wrathful fury of an Empress scorned while accompanied by the ever insidious Drake Morrass, and Thanquil sets out to find and judge his one heretical loose end.THE PRICE OF FAITH is the third book of the The Ties that Bind trilogy by Rob J. Hayes.
author: Rob J. Hayes
